short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Harvest button to pulses on monday.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The “Harvest Monday Integration” Chrome extension adds a button to each pulse in monday.com when it is opened. 

Clicking this button will open the Harvest Time Tracker, while the extension will attempt to associate the name of the monday.com board with a project in Harvest when it loads (the board name and the project name in Harvest must the same).

The extension then pre-populates the time tracking note with the name of the pulse from monday.com. When time tracking is then started, it will automatically link the pulse from monday.com with the tracked time entry from Harvest.
